website_summaries.verdict: Designed for those who want an authentic wok experience, this pan requires more maintenance than many competitors.
cons: Can sustain the high heat of a butane burner, but durability may be compromised at this extreme temp

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with a well built Wok
customer_reviews.text: Definitely glad I did some research and bought a quality wok, instead of wasting money on a nonstick. After seasoning the wok 3 times with flax seed oil the wok was ready for ginger and spring onion. Please read the directions or watch a youtube tutorial on how to season a carbon steel wok. The one star reviews are from people who didn't follow directions. We love cooking fried rice, noodle dishes and stir fry in our wok!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T.

customer_reviews.title: It will darken with use.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a wok for some time and finally bought this for myself after having it on my wish list. I wanted to cook Chinese dishes more authentically. It's great once you get it seasoned. The color darkens with use and age, but that's the nature of the material. If you keep it sparkling silver, you're not really cooking, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Nandy

customer_reviews.title: Quit fussing about rust
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wok. Even if it comes with a little rust (mine did not) but even if it did just hit it with some steel wool and then season properly. The value is great and even if you manage to rust yours just use some very fine sand paper and start again. Its just rust guys quit throwing a fit. Season it properly and keep it oiled and it won't rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance, time consuming, but works
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine but is *not for folks with little time on their hands.* I read the reviews and knew what I was getting into. It works well but is pretty high maintenance so just think about your lifestyle and how often you hand wash stuff. For me, as a mom of two who can’t always get around to cleaning a dish *right* after I cook in it, I was surprised how fast it rusted. Granted I was able to get the rust out using the provided cleaning directions... It will work, and it will rust. You just have to be committed;) And really into seasoning (first seasoning you have to do 3-4 times!)
customer_reviews.author: kaj amir

customer_reviews.title: after seasoning the handle is unacceptably lose and feels like it will fall off any second
customer_reviews.text: My first wok. Seasoned via YouTube info and went very well. BUT, after seasoning the handle is unacceptably lose and feels like it will fall off any second. I will use this as long as it stays together. Next time I'll go to the local Asian Market and get one from them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: WISH I HAD GOTTEN SOONER
customer_reviews.text: I use this for more than a wok. I will definitely be getting a small fry pan next. Love this...the seasoning of the pan gives food so much more flavor. The pan itself is beautiful. At first seemed kinda big, but after using it is perfect because it gives you the room you need to move the food around without it spilling out. LOVE THIS PAN.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: but like previous reviewers
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well-constructed wok, but like previous reviewers, I have found that despite diligent 'curing' the metal tends to show 'rusting' after each use. The sides of this particular wok are 'grooved or slotted' which is different from the 'hammered' sides on my previous wok - I believe that I prefer the latter, although this design has not caused any concerns. Of course, this wok does not come with a 'lid', so the cost of the total investment is not inconsequential - worth compare shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Wm Earl Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a wok for 20 years that worked great, but it was getting a bit dented and the lid was pretty banged up, so I thought I'd get a new one. I looked at MANY and finally decided on this one. I use my wok a lot (not just for asian cooking,) and was VERY disappointed that after, maybe, the 10th use, the teflon is peeling off the both the interior and bottom. It's a piece of junk in my book. I am again shopping for a new wok.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: ... the lining in it I would have rated it better. Had to scrub the lining out
customer_reviews.text: If this pan didn't have the lining in it I would have rated it better. Had to scrub the lining out, which took forever, and it seems like it will be a million times better. But I do feel like its the type of pan that you could make one wrong move and it will be rusted out, so unless you know how to season your pans and keep them oiled I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to rust even if applying seasoning before the first use and after using it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wok for mom because she loves traditional Chinese iron wok instead of my non-stick Ikea one. I bought this one for her and applied seasoning based on the instruction. However, it still got rust on it after one use, one use! Then we became super careful and even added a coat of oil after using it. It still got rusty the next day. I'm so disappointed and not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Ziying

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles on flat stove top and steel appears to be flaking off
customer_reviews.text: The wok does not seem to have a very flat bottom; it wobbles on my flat stove top. I am also concerned about the wok steel flaking off (notice the steel changes from a shiny color to a flat dirty gray color). See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: If ya just gotta have a new wok, look at this one.
customer_reviews.text: Having been a "Wok Burner" for years, this works with my new induction cooktop.. I would have liked a 12" model when "cooking for one" but it still does the job and is easy to handle. The ridged sides are the soul of a well designed wok, and Ms Chen obviously knows this. If you don't have a cover that will fit this model, I'd advise getting one.. -pp
customer_reviews.author: P. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Follow youtube video to season the wok-absolutely NECESSARY
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this wok everyday as it's easy and non stick after properly seasoned. Much easier/lighter than cast iron and will not release toxic fume/chemical into my food like Teflon pan. Never register to me that I can buy one of these as it's always labelled as "restaurant" wok for me.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Y Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: I should have believe the reviews. You can not get the protective lacquer finish off to season the Wok. I cleaned it according the instructions. I tried Lacqure Thinner, Oven Cleaned. Nothing removed the procetive finish. I even tried SOS pads with some Elbow Grease. It look like removed the finish. When I tried to Season the Wok following the directions. Med heat, 2 T. Oil for 10 Mins Rubbing the oil around the wok. It looked like a Poor Paint Job, The Procetive Finish burned and smelled like Burnt paint.
customer_reviews.author: BigMike

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to someone who loves wok cooking. They absolutely love using it. They watched the videos for proper seasoning of it and use it on a regular basis, a couple times a week at least since it's easy maintenance. They couldn't be happier. It's only been 2 months but so far it is holding up. I hope to remember to check in after another 6 months or so to see if it is holding up and will let you know in an edit.
customer_reviews.author: gptraveler

customer_reviews.title: Pollutant Free, Easy clean, Fast cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it's size and readiness of cleaning. The only drawback is the oil coating comes off when I cook and I had to pre-season it afterwards. But overall I like it. Best for vegetable stir fry with light sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great wok. Seasoned as directed when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Great wok. Seasoned as directed when it arrived. A small PIA, but came out a nice consistent black and makes awesome stir fry dishes on my gas stove. Good weight and feel. Pro woks may be a bit thicker guage; but for the price, this one is really hard to beat. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: uglypony

customer_reviews.title: I love this size wok
customer_reviews.text: A little work at the start, but will be worth it to eat healthier. I love this size wok. It will hold enough for leftovers, and can be used to steam or fry. I love to have plenty of room to work with high sides on wok so food doesn't fly out. I bought a cover and ring, as well. The ring may not be necessary, but should be helpful when frying. The cover will be useful while simmering or steaming. I just leave the wok on the stove since it is so large. I plan to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to season properly on an induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made wok It MUST be seasoned properly so as not to rust Unfortunately i have an induction cooktop and have not been able to season the sides of the wok on my cooktop (the sides dont get hot enough) This is a great choice if you have a gas stove & will season it properly
customer_reviews.author: Arik Olson

customer_reviews.title: My 1st Wok
customer_reviews.text: First time wok owner here. I love using this to cook stir fry dishes. Make sure to read up on how to season and store your wok.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin steel. Arrived with the side bent at the handle. Was able to bend it back, but there’s a permanent crease. Decided not to return it, since I’ll probably continue to heat it up, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, need a 12 inch version complete with dome and accessories for around same price
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, need a 12 inch version complete with dome and accessories for around same price. Found Joyce chen wok seasoning tutorial in youtube and followed
customer_reviews.author: Jhen&James

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: This wok is one of the best ones I’ve used. The only thing you need to notice is to do the seasoning follow the instructions. After you do the seasoning a few times, it will be nonstick. Make sure swipe the water from the wok after you wash it. Put it on the top of oven until it totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: Yaojian Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok
customer_reviews.text: Quality Wok that's extremely large and gives more than enough room to cook massive amounts of food. The Wok changes color and becomes seasoned quite easily and with the side handle flipping food is easy, I would highly recommend if you want an affordable Wok for large family size meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Wok! Looks very nice, very durable, easy to season. Easy to clean. Made well. Seller very easy to work with. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and granddaughter. They both like to cook and love stir fry. Very sturdy and the wooden handles are very safe and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Janalive

customer_reviews.title: Everybody likes a wok
customer_reviews.text: I already had one this was for my daughter, who also likes to cook using a wok. We clean with chain mail, I think that’s how it’s spelled. Then season like any cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Wok now for 5 years and it is perfectly seasoned. I do everything in this bad boy, including cooking eggs and popcorn. It has seasoned up so well that I can actually flip the eggs without a spatula now. Seems like most of the negative reviews are from individuals who do not really know what they are getting into with a real wok that you have to season yourself. It takes time to properly season but once it is seasoned it is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: works well but a pain to care for
customer_reviews.text: works well but needs a lot of extra care to avoid rusting - over time should be completely non-stick but we will see if it is worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: toni didona

customer_reviews.title: Loose handle and bad shape retention
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight material. After a few uses the rivets for the handle are coming loose and the shape is warped.
customer_reviews.author: MrN

customer_reviews.title: You Must Season This Wok!
customer_reviews.text: This great wok for the price. Good scrubbing is essential before seasoning. If using on electric stove. Season it in oven, there are you tube videos on how to. Then season 2-3 times on stove turning on side and using pungent vegetables. I wish I had brought this before I wasted money on a nonstick. Better to get classics carbon steel like this instead of nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: So bad.
customer_reviews.text: this is so not a nonstick wok... even with the coating that is suppose to be nonstick is coming off. after just 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works but also goes bad pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: the good - works - ok to clean the bad - quality is crap - gets scratches easily
customer_reviews.author: Yuri K.

customer_reviews.title: A Wok to Remember
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how much fun and how much easier it is to make stir-fry and other dishes. Seasoning the pan was super easy and it cooks so very well. The heat distribution is wonderful even on an electric stove! We won't be getting a rid of this wok anytime soon! We look forward to decades of cooking with this!
customer_reviews.author: Dietrichs

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok. My first one. Heats quickly over gas so watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Orange T-shirt

customer_reviews.title: Only use plastic ware we’re cooking with her to avoid scratches in the coating.
customer_reviews.text: The wok works perfectly but it is easy to scratch which will result in rust developing in the bottom of the pan. If you keep it seasoned with oil and use a paper towel to wipe it out after you use it stays pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable must-have carbon steel wok
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to season. Just follow the instructions. It takes only 15 minutes and when I started to fry some garlic and eggs, the pan was well seasoned that none of the egg or garlic were stick to the pan. Repeat it a few more times and then my wok became non-stick. For this price, I would definitely recommend this to anyone who like to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Joy K

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was requested as a gift, so I did not use it myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing I’ve used this a ton. Great value for the wok
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dobben

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok!
customer_reviews.text: If you'll take time to read up or watch a video or two about how to season your wok, this one will make you very happy. Nice and heavy. I can't imagine ever needing another one unless i manage to burn up the handles on this one. At my local Asian food store, they sell some that are very lightweight and flimsy. This one is not one of those. Get one. Maybe two. That way you can sautee (like my wife likes to do) in one without compromising the patina on the other.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Lesson learned. You get what you pay for. Thought I should pay less since my first time using a wok. Did exactly as instructed. Used one time. All food stuck to wok and after washing carefully the item is now rusted. What a waste. Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy DeMattos

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: i had one of these for three years and it worked great. It ended up rusting because my boyfriend didn't know there were special cleaning instructions (which are included), so I ended up buying another. Really like this wok. The new one didn't come with a lid so I kept the old lid - highly recommend getting a lid. Be sure to follow the instructions for prepping and cleaning the wok.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: Love the wok. Once it is seasoned it works well and I love the size - perfect for most family needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY UNLESS YOU LIKE FOOD THAT TASTES LIKE METAL
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product; cheap junk. Everything tastes metallic that made in it. Ruins everything! STAY AWAY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jim rasor

customer_reviews.title: They are unfinished and will quickly get dirty and hard to clean unless you put mineral oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Handles are solid. They are unfinished and will quickly get dirty and hard to clean unless you put mineral oil (or some other finish) on them like I did. The ridges hold food up on the sides well. I'm using an induction heater and it heats very quickly. The heat drops off quickly going up the sides. I can't get this wok to take a seasoning on the sides, but the bottom is at least fairly well seasoned. It looks like that's because the induction stove doesn't heat up the sides enough. It rusts quickly on the inside where it's unseasoned, so I have to oil it after almost every use. The outside doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: TomBrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Warped at handle
customer_reviews.text: Would probably be a nice wok except that it is dented where they installed the handle, warping the shape of the wok and preventing a round lid from fitting. As someone who has experience with woks, I was a bit disappointed. Perhaps it was just the particular one I received and a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wok!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves to cook and we've been looking for a good quality wok for a while! This wok has done its job and we have no complaints! It's easy to clean and easy to use. I would recommend for anyone looking for a quality wok for their kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: VCH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the wok I had 20 years ago. Sturdy and works well on our gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J.

customer_reviews.title: a pain to keep rust free
customer_reviews.text: maybe i'm not seasoning it well, but have to start all over after every use : ( and even after seasoning it, still have a slight rusty smell when cooking. threw mine out : (
customer_reviews.author: MMauro

customer_reviews.title: Black substance appears when I try to initially remove factory coating
customer_reviews.text: When I try to boil off the initial factory coating off the wok, these black substance start appearing. I tried to clean it off with scotch brite pad it leaves marks behind. Maybe I got the lemon or something. I just ordered replacement. I will update my review once I get me replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Minkyoung K.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably bad product
customer_reviews.text: I had a wok already. It was a cheap $15 wok that I used for 15 years. My wife decided I was due for a new (better) one and got me this one. After two uses it began to rust inside and out. Extremely poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin fednander

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely hard and time consuming to remove lacquer and season only to rust using Frozen stir fry
customer_reviews.author: Graphics Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly without issue
customer_reviews.text: Great wok lives up to the previous reviews: Pros: Cooks evenly Well made Cons: The bottom is hard to clean from the open flame
customer_reviews.author: sleeper

customer_reviews.title: In the trash!
customer_reviews.text: This deserve a zero.Junk! Save your money. Threw mines out within a week.
customer_reviews.author: KeepingIt

customer_reviews.title: Quality product,  works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get it seasoned peoperly but now it's great. Food does not stick. Read the directions before using.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henning

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Joyce chen wok and the top that I bought with it is perfect it sits on top the way I like it on certain recipes. I don't no what every one is talking about yes the lid sits a little inside but not by much at all, I mean its not like your cooking your food the hole time with the lid on, and if so that is not a stir fry. the lid is only for at best 5 minutes of cover time. VERY VERY HAPPY WITH BOTH WOK & LID TO MATCH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks cheap, feels cheap, but it works
customer_reviews.text: The wok I received is not even in round shape. But it's the carbon steel that gets the cooking work done. So buy a carbon steel wok, but not from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used it, the coating on the bottom of the pan flaked off and mixed with the food....ruining the meal. A major disappointment! Product has been returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wok On
customer_reviews.text: I use this nearly everyday for stir fry veggies and all sorts of things. This is my most favorite wok. Love the dual handles, it's light but not aluminum (which I won't use -- aluminum has been implicated in causing Alsheimer's you know). Cooks evenly. Washes up with just water. And great value.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Shields

customer_reviews.title: Also notice that this wok bends more than I would like. Not impressed with it so far
customer_reviews.text: I see someone else recently has the same complaint as I do. Received this a couple days ago. Spent a few hours seasoning it. I already notice the handle is quite loose now. Also notice that this wok bends more than I would like. Not impressed with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy in SF

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: As much as I want to like this wok, its started to rust the moment I washed it the first time. Even after seasoning the wok it still rusts up and its honestly very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Thin bottom
customer_reviews.text: Heats up at the bottom very fast burning the food. Very thin sheet, even in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: I pushed it back into place fairly easily. As far as performance
customer_reviews.text: my order arrived damaged. the wok was really asymmetrical and bent. I pushed it back into place fairly easily. As far as performance; after following the instructions to preseason the wok I found that it heated up very quickly over an 18k btu open burner and did pretty well. Construction seems pretty decent for the price. I am curious to see how it holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This wok rocks
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before I decided to buy this wok. And I absolutely love it. I seasoned it in the oven and then fried some chive leaves in it to get rid of the steel taste. This wok is so much better than the non-stick pans or woks I used before when it comes to cooking Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: hannahseabird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wok! have to keep it greased so it won't rust.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEFINA NOA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wok
customer_reviews.text: Use to have a very good wok years ago, but when we downsized we sold it. Picked up an inexpensive wok last year (at WalMart), and it worked okay but not the size or quality that we were use to. So the husband, who does the majority of the Chinese cooking got busy searching. Searched online and at several quality cooking stores. This is the wok he decided on ... no regrets whatsoever. It is a great wok for the price. We will never use the utensils that came with it, stuck in a drawer for now. Our old wok is being passed on to our daughter - but we sure are enjoying oriental cooking once again.
customer_reviews.author: AcupateaAcres

customer_reviews.title: so good. I have seasoned it according to directions and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have seasoned it according to directions and we have cooked one dish in it so far. No problems, and we both really like having th extended handle to control the pan without having to reach for the potholders every time. Time and usage could raise this to a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: The Wok works well enough and is sturdy. The reason I give it 3 starts though ...
customer_reviews.text: The Wok works well enough and is sturdy. The reason I give it 3 starts though is because it took forever to season. After using it a few times the season just flakes right off too. After using it a dozen times the original seasoning is almost completely gone and parts look a little rusty. For now I'm just keeping it well oiled and hoping it'll season itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ptolamy

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan for the cash!
customer_reviews.text: The wok arrived as stated. I read s few reviews before ordering and all of them emphasized proper sessoning of the wok. I seasoned it and have only had the chance to use it once but I can see a lot of stir fry in my future! Its fresh, healthy, fast, and can be inexpensive...what more could you want??? I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ZBbaskin

customer_reviews.title: Season it!
customer_reviews.text: Season it! It will turn out perfect if you season it the right way. Just be careful while seasoning it, you might burn the handle, I almost did.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy handle, holds a lot..!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Wok, easy clean up after cooking. Lt cool, then scrub with a copper cleaning pad, reheat & oil for the next time, to prevent rust.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ive ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My boyfriend and i love to cook so this helped a lot. Just make sure to season it and never wash it with soap. Bad life decision made by boyfriend. So we purchased a second one and are still happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Murry

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok
customer_reviews.text: I use this wok to cook chinese food and it is amazing. It gets hot really quick. Wok's do use a lot of oil to create a nonstick surface so if you're interested in this do your research
customer_reviews.author: Ping Xuan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, heavy duty, wok. I purchased as Christmas present for my husband. He loves it. Very versatile too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griner

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron vs carbon
customer_reviews.text: After 1st use everything stuck on it. Tried everything to get off.whish I had got the regular cast iron wok instead.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great carbon steel wok
customer_reviews.text: After a little bit of use this wok only gets better. If taken care of, it seasons easily and is very easy to care for
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: very well built feels like it will last a longtime
customer_reviews.text: Came FAST, very well built feels like it will last a longtime. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mike palka

customer_reviews.title: Bad wok
customer_reviews.text: The handle doesn't stay attached and gets very hot. Poor quality. Only thing I use is the lid and chopsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P.

customer_reviews.title: This is the true wok to use for best heat conductivity.!
customer_reviews.text: All other woks do not have this heat conductivity. Do not use no. Stick or stainless. This is the authentic tool to use. Must be seasoned,
customer_reviews.author: joyce spletzer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wasted money Wok delivered Thursday morning used Thursday night washed and hung up on island entire pan rusted
customer_reviews.author: Donte

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it better than non-stick...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Better the non-stick wok...after 4 months it was loosing non-stick!!! Hopefully it better the non-stick?
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Gorny

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this wok! It can definitely be used for things other than stir fry. Be sure and follow the instructions for seasoning it before use. I know this pan will last me many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Richey

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the wok seasoned, it cooks like a charm. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite wok. Keeping it clean and treated takes a couple minutes at most, food heats and cooks evenly, and the handles make for easy manipulation. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita

customer_reviews.title: Wok
customer_reviews.text: Too large. It is heavy and not easy to clean. Rust’s if water is not removed. Wanted smaller version. Wish to exchange this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchi

customer_reviews.title: Joyce Chen 14" carbon steel wok
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape. Very sturdy and good stiffness to the metal. Good size and heft. Not light weight. Directions easy to follow to season. Sturdy rivets. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nimnal

customer_reviews.title: steel wok
customer_reviews.text: I got this long ago, and did not know about seasoning. So, it became rusty and iron-smelly. I got it again, I watched youtube 'how to season a work'. I don't think I seasoned perfectly, but it works good. Not rusty, not iron smell yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sua

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: Started to rust after first was, 0 stars, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to properly season this WOK and clean it with warm water and a sponge... It is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: A good product. Sense of use are really good
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Sense of use are really good. ... Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: Cooks everything evenly and heats up fast. We have uses it many times and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: ritastew

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I
customer_reviews.text: Came with a rust spot. Not as sturdy as I thought
customer_reviews.author: jeffery s.

customer_reviews.title: Out for a Wok
customer_reviews.text: Delivers as a good wok should, keep it oiled though.
customer_reviews.author: Chas D Lind

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Great Product! Cooking is amazing! Just make sure to prep it and oil it! Really big surface to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Do not buy. The photo above is after one use and one wash. 0/5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Barritt

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the wife and I used it the other night to make stired fried rice, chicken and shrimp - vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Needs seasoning
customer_reviews.text: First time doing the seasoning but I guess it turned out alright
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I would like a flat bottomed wok but it does the trick! It took a little bit to get it seasoned they way I wanted but that was just due to the way I was cleaning it
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weeks

customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this There is no cover It is a scam

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of stir fry meals and this wok works great.
